name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avora: AI Research & Browser Copilot with GPT-4 and Claude

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avora provides a context-relevant AI assistant straight to your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avora: Your Intelligent Browser Assistant

Enhance your browsing with Avora, an AI-powered extension that offers contextual assistance as you navigate the web.

Features:
• Context-aware insights: Avora understands the content of your current webpage.
• Natural language interaction: Ask questions about browsing content for quick, relevant answers.
• Link analysis: Examine web pages and search results for comprehensive information.
• Research support: Access AI-driven insights to aid your online research.

Usage:
1. Install Avora
2. Browse normally
3. Interact with Avora when you need assistance
4. Receive AI-generated responses

Available Plans:
• Free: Basic assistance with limited advanced features
• Standard: More advanced prompts available
• Pro: Full access to advanced prompts and research capabilities

Avora aims to streamline your web browsing, helping you focus on essential information.
